a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual working hours per worker, various sources, France, 1870 to 2019
Comparison of various sources of annual working hours estimates. Note that not all sources publish data for every
Source: OECD (2020), Feenstra et al. (2015), PWT v10.0, Bick et al. (2019), Huberman & Minns (2007)
Note: OECD data refers to average annual hours actually worked per worker; PWT data refers to average annual hours worked by persons
engaged; Bick et al data refers to average annual hours worked per employed person; Huberman & Minns data refers to annual hours of full-time
production workers (male and female) in non-agricultural activities
